system.description:
You have learned to supplement your divine power with survival training … or perhaps it is the other way ‘round. In either case, you can carry the word of your god to remote places, or at least ones that require travel through the wilderness, with less fear than most. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom score increases by +1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You can enhance your training with a boost of divine power. When you use Stride and Seek, you may spend a use of Channel Divinity.
    • If you are using Hunter’s Target, the bonus damage increases to 2d6.
    • If you are using Swift Feet, it lasts for 10 minutes and your movement increases by 5 feet for the duration.
  • Gain an additional Exploration Knack or Sign of Faith of your choice. It does not count against your maximum number known, and in the future, when you would select a Sign of Faith or Exploration Knack, you can choose from either list.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in Cleric, 3 levels in Ranger
